module.name: leguide
module.description: LeGuide
module.description_full: LeGuide.com группы, сети путеводители по магазинам, сайтов сравнения цен, двигатели торговых поиска и онлайн-форумах потребителя, является лидером в области Франции и № 2 в Европе, с 12,8 миллиона уникальных посетителей . Компания является надежным посредником между пользователями и магазин сайтов, а также помогает покупателям на каждом этапе их покупки в Интернете, помогая им ударить, что торговый высокой оценки через специальные предложения. LeGuide.com Группа присутствует в 14 странах и насчитывает более 60,000 интернет-магазинов и 135 миллионов единиц продукции. (* Comscore апреля 2010) Особенности Leguide.com Модуль позволит вам: - Синхронизировать весь магазин, чтобы LeGuide.com автоматически с учетом конкретных планирования LeGuide.com Это даст Вам возможность развить свой бизнес и продемонстрировать свои вашего сайта лучшие предложения . Найти все модули для компараторов PrestaShop в категории comparateurs де Prix PrestaShop
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: seohelping
module.description: Модуль SEO для P﻿restaShop поможет Вам улучшить сетевую оптимизацию Вашего магазина!﻿ Модуль SEO PrestaShop автоматически заполнит поля, важные для сетевой оптимизации
module.description_full: Модуль SEO для P﻿restaShop поможет Вам улучшить сетевую оптимизацию Вашего магазина!﻿ Модуль SEO PrestaShop автоматически заполнит поля, важные для сетевой оптимизации. Таким образом, вне зависимости от количества товаров Ваш магазин будет проиндексирован во всех поисковых системах! Вы сможете ввести теги согласно большому количеству критериев таких как название товара,его родительская категория, произволитель, атрибуты товаров и т.д. Благодаря этому модулю у Вас будут уникальные теги на каждой из страниц, а также ключевый слова, которые соответствуют Вашему сайту. Это повысит Вашу индексацию. Ниже Вы найдете список полей, которые автоматически заполняются с помощью модуля SEO: Тег Title : этот тег отвечает за название, которое будет фигурировать вверху каждой страницы и во всех поисковых системах. Набор и порядок слов обязательны. Тег Meta_Description : это поле соответствует описанию каждой страницы, фигурирующей во всех поисковых системах. Именно этот текст является визитной карточкой и пробуждает желание зайти на Ваш сайт. Тег Meta_Keyword : широко используется поисковыми системами Yahoo и Bing, где учитываются ключевые слова. Тег Url_rewrite : Возможность создания ЧПУ для каждой страницы Вашего магазина, что поможет его сетевой оптимизации. Short_Description : Данное поле предназначено для краткого описания Ваших товаров, которое будет индексироваться в поисковых системах. Совокупность тегов позволит увеличить Вашу видимость и индексироваться в поисковых системах.
module.author: PrestaShop

module.displayName: Google Merchant Center: the best Google Shopping module
module.description: Upload your products to Google Shopping and get thousands of new, highly qualified visitors on your online shop
module.description_full: Upload your products to Google Shopping and get thousands of new, highly qualified visitors on your online shop.
module.additional_description: Also discover our Google Rich Snippets + Product Ratings and Reviews module on http://addons.prestashop.com/en/seo-prestashop-modules/6144-google-rich-snippets-product-ratings-and-reviews.html and Google Remarketing + Dynamic on http://addons.prestashop.com/en/advertising-marketing-newsletter-modules/9736-google-remarketing-dynamic.html The position of your products in these results depends largely on the quality of your feed and completeness of your data. The more information you include, the better the results ! This module will let you achieve just that and maximize your chances of obtaining good rankings on Google Shopping, while minimizing the time you will need to spend to have all your products accepted by Google. module.description: Work with PDF in PrestaShop on a higher level. Get more options for creating PDF documents in PrestaShop
module.description_full: Work with PDF in PrestaShop on a higher level. Get more options for creating PDF documents in PrestaShop. Using templates, you can create your own look for PDF invoices, mailing labels, product catalogs, price lists, and even more.
module.additional_description: 10 reasons you should use this module 1) Customize PDFs quickly and easily 2) Online template editor 3) More than 70 templates to choose from 4) Wide range of customisable options available 5) Consistently high quality PDF output 6) More options, more accuracy 7) No restrictions for fonts and languages 8) Seamless integration with your shop 9) Investment protection 10) More than 700 satisfied customers
module.author: Community

module.name: prestanotify
module.description: Увеличьте Ваши продажи с модулем PopUp-окна! PopUp-окна-возможность сообщить о флэш-продажах, распродажах, скидках, а также сопровождать Ваших клиентов с момента входа на Ваш сайт
module.description_full: Увеличьте Ваши продажи с модулем PopUp-окна! PopUp-окна-возможность сообщить о флэш-продажах, распродажах, скидках, а также сопровождать Ваших клиентов с момента входа на Ваш сайт. Очеь простой в использовании: Вам всего лишь нужно добавить картинку или текст, добавить ссылку на соответсвующую страницу. И вот, будьте уверены, что у Вы осуществите дополнителтные продажи товаров выбранной категории.

module.description: Становящиеся все более популярными, подарочные сертификаты дополнят Вашу коллекцию товаров и помогут даже самым нерешитеьным покупателям выбрать подарок по вкусу! Дайте Вашим покупателям удобную
module.description_full: Становящиеся все более популярными, подарочные сертификаты дополнят Вашу коллекцию товаров и помогут даже самым нерешитеьным покупателям выбрать подарок по вкусу! Дайте Вашим покупателям удобную возможность купить подарочные сертификаты!
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: amazon
module.description: Prestashop Addons exclusive, the Amazon Market Place for Prestashop is the #1 solution to sell your products online to Amazon Marketplace
module.description_full: Prestashop Addons exclusive, the Amazon Market Place for Prestashop is the #1 solution to sell your products online to Amazon Marketplace.
module.additional_description: Strengthen your Store with Amazon Market Place by reaching new customers, increasing sales and creating more visibility for your e-commerce : Synchronize products, stocks, and prices on Amazon Create Products on Amazon directly from your Prestashop backend The Amazon Market Place application lets you seamlessly share your inventory on Amazon and updates your catalog quickly Take advantage of the resources available to you on the internet and boost sales when you share your products on one of the world’s most popular shopping marketplaces. Instructions : Open an account on Amazon Market Place: http://sellercentral.amazon.fr (Professionnal Account) Install the Amazon Market Place for PrestaShop application Put your products on line in just three clicks Boost your sales potential and distribute your products across the entire Amazon market: Europe : France, United Kingdom, Germany, Spain, Italy Worldwide : United States, Canada, Japan, China, India Take your potential to the next level: an optional application allows your sales prices to be adjusted regularly on Amazon relative to your competitors! Orders: An orders tab allows your orders from Amazon to be integrated directly into your PrestaShop back office. You can choose: To import your orders manually Ise scheduled tasks and processing orders as they arrive Shipping Notification : A tool on the orders page allows to notify directly the customer that their Amazon Market Place order has been dispatched. The tracking number is sen and the status is automatically switched on Amazon Products: Your products must have an UPC (and/or EAN13) code or an Exemption from Amazon. The module is able to create products having an EAN13/UPC code directly into the marketplace Using a simple formula, you have the chance to create a price increase rule for your products, for example to cushion the effect of the margin collected by Amazon (e.g. +10% on all products or +1 euro on all products) News and Features: Product Sheet Creation directly from Prestashop The module allows to send Title, Image and Description Handling Second Hand and Refurbished products Multi-Carriers (Eg: Standard, Express) Shipping fees per articles, per category or global FBA Support, FBA Multi-Site/Multi-Channel Support Sales/Discount Fast Inventory Edition Automatic Invoice by Email through Amazon Web Service Automatic shipping notifications, status changes Information about product creation feature : http://blog.common-services.com/en/amazon-market-place-pour-prestashop-v3-5/ Information about FBA features : http://blog.common-services.com/en/amazon-3-9-fba-fulfillment/ Other news and informations on our blog : http://blog.common-services.com/en
module.author: Common-Services

module.name: pm_advancedsearch4
module.description: Best Module Award Winner - Add the fastest layered navigation system for PrestaShop !
module.description_full: Best Module Award Winner - Add the fastest layered navigation system for PrestaShop !
module.additional_description: Provide to your customers the products that meet their needs. Indispensable tool for shops offering a wide selection of products, Advanced Search 4 can add as many search engines as you want and place them in different places on your website. This module was developed in an effort to provide short loading times, even on large catalogs. Your visitors can browse products that match their search criteria, to make their purchases in minimal time. Winner of the Best PrestaShop Modules Awards 2012 Advanced Search 4 won the Best module of the year Award at the PrestaShop BarCamp of Barcelona (Spain)! Indispensable tool for shops offering a wide selection of products. Advanced Search 4 adds the multi-layered navigation, search by step, filters and multi-criteria searches. Each search is saved over the navigation, allowing your visitors to return to the results of their research at any time. Google is his friend This PrestaShop Addon is a small revolution for SEO. Advanced Search 4 generate a mass-produced products pages optimized for SEO, and without duplicate content! Pick up your criteria on which you want to improve your SEO, validate them, and here you go with hundreds of pages listing your products, including: re-written URL, H1 tags, description, meta tags, automatised cross links... To maximize your reputation, these results pages can be shared on most social networks places around the internet, as well as sent by e-mail.

module.name: mynewsletter
module.description: Удерживайте как можно больше Ваших клиентов, отправляя им качественные информационные письма! Модуль Newsletter and Statistics поможет оптимизировать Ваши письма в зависимости от желаний и потребн
module.description_full: Удерживайте как можно больше Ваших клиентов, отправляя им качественные информационные письма! Модуль Newsletter and Statistics поможет оптимизировать Ваши письма в зависимости от желаний и потребностей клиентов!﻿ Также с этим модулем Вам не потребуется роутер.
module.additional_description: Анализируйте статистику Вашего магазина: Теперь Вы сможте проанализировать каждую аналитическую деталь. Таким образом, теперь владельцы магазинов могут проанализировать недостатки отправленных информационных писем и внести коррективы в последующие. ﻿ Дополнительные преимущества... Персонализированное информационное письмо Создание Вашего собственного брендаПостоянный контакт с Вашими клиентами Оповещение Ваших клиентов об обновлениях, акциях и т.д...
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: pm_seointernallinking
module.description: Improve your SEO through internal linking strategy
module.description_full: Improve your SEO through internal linking strategy
module.additional_description: Enhance your PrestaShop SEO Internal linking is the creation of links between pages of your shop, using keywords you want to achieve a better place on Google. To optimize the SEO of your website, it is essential to create an internal linking that will allow search engines to browse your shop in the most easy way as possible. The goal is to provide maximum informations with the least clicks deep. SEO Internal Linking PrestaShop module optimizes the organization of navigation in your store, and plays an essential role in your SEO strategy. Define the keywords on which you wish to be listed and their landing pages, and let the module create the links for you! If you want to add automatic links in your categories descriptions, consider installing our PrestaShop module HTML On Descriptions. Do we really need internal linking? Internal linking strategy based on specific keywords is an optimization method that has proven its worth. Especially to enhance a content relevance. Among the disadvantages, you should know that the installation of these links is long and tedious, and requires to follow SEO good practices, to not over-optimize (which would be detected by Google), and must be updated regularly to track changes in your catalog. With this in mind, we have developed this module, allowing you to deploy thousands of cross links between your pages within minutes, while being sure to observe best practice guidelines of White Hat SEO. It has been designed to support both SEO agencies and e-shop owners. SEO Internal Linking is really simple to manage.
module.author: Presta-Module

module.name: ordertaxprofitreport
module.displayName: Advanced sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports
module.description: Create professional sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports in HTML format or export as a CSV / Excel file
module.description_full: Create professional sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports in HTML format or export as a CSV / Excel file.
module.additional_description: Get perfect visibility on your shop's and products' profitability ! The default PrestaShop installation does not provide a one-click tool that allows you to obtain important accounting and financial data: tax due, net sales volume after discounts and, most importantly, profit and profit margin. Not only will this report provide you with all this data, but it will even allow you to answer questions like "what percentage of total sales and / or profits does this specific brand, supplier or product category represent ?". This stylish and pleasant AJAX based module allows you to generate different types of preformed reports with all this information. They can be viewed on screen in HTML format or exported as a CSV file to manipulate in Excel and / or import into any other information or accounting system. This module is developed and published by Business Tech, certified PrestaShop developer and winner of the 2011 PrestaShop Awards for Best module. You are guaranteed to buy a quality module and to get fast and efficient tech support in case you need it.
module.author: Business Tech
module.url: http://addons.prestashop.com/ru/analytics-stats/5255-advanced-sales-tax-profit-and-profit-margin-reports.html?utm_source=v1trunk_api&utm_content=advanced sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports

module.name: orderpreparation
module.description: Save time in preparing your order through this module! With one click, this module allows you to extract the commands in the pipeline, and sort by location or product
module.description_full: Save time in preparing your order through this module! With one click, this module allows you to extract the commands in the pipeline, and sort by location or product. You just have to take the corresponding quantities at each location. Prepare faster your orders!
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: siretcustomergroup
module.description: Differentiate your business customers of individuals with this SIRET module which transfers the professionals in a given customer group
module.description_full: Differentiate your business customers of individuals with this SIRET module which transfers the professionals in a given customer group.
module.additional_description: Finally, you can easily manage your professional customers just by asking their SIRET to transfer them in a client group or there is no tax for example, with prices reduced (e.g. wholesalers)...
module.author: Community

module.name: pm_multiplefeatures
module.displayName: Multiple Features - Assign your features as you want
module.description: Multiple Features allows you to assign multiple values ​​of features to your products
module.description_full: Multiple Features allows you to assign multiple values ​​of features to your products
module.additional_description: Add features to your PrestaShop catalog without limits! With Multiple Features, you can assign as many values as necessary for the same product and the same feature. Remove this PrestaShop limitation and start using your features as you want! If you also use our layered navigation system Advanced Search 4 (Winner of PrestaShop Best Module Awards 2012), you can give to your customers a more relevant research in your catalog. Customer study : Ocarat.com: "Some jewelry may have a different composition and an alloy of several metals. PrestaShop provides the ability to associate a feature to a product. However, I want to integrate in my shop a gold ring set with diamonds and emeralds. But features tab does not allow me to do so. I can't assign multiple values to a single purpose. So I have to choose between gold, diamonds or emeralds. Multiple Features remove PrestaShop limits and allows you to use features as you want !"
module.author: Presta-Module
module.url: http://addons.prestashop.com/ru/search-filter/6356-multiple-features-assign-your-features-as-you-want.html?utm_source=v1trunk_api&utm_content=multiple features - assign your features as you want

module.name: pm_cachemanager
module.description: Decrease your loading page time generation
module.description_full: Decrease your loading page time generation
module.additional_description: Improve your conversion rate and SEO The statistics are clear: the main reason why a user leave a web page is the loading time. Yahoo! said that adding 400ms to the page loading time on their car website raises the dropout rate from 5 to 9%. (Sources: Performance Web) In addition, the speed display is a guarantee of quality which has a very positive influence on the positioning in the search engines. Let your customers enjoy a more comfortable navigation on your website by shortening the loading time of pages, and saving his time! Limited offer : Price drop & Satisfied or refunded !
module.author: Presta-Module

module.name: lgabonos
module.displayName: Credit Notes / Memos - Cancellation of Invoices
module.description: Create full credit notes / memos for any invoice you need to cancel. Issue the notes in PDF and send them to your clients
module.description_full: Create full credit notes / memos for any invoice you need to cancel. Issue the notes in PDF and send them to your clients.
module.additional_description: This module allows you to create full credit notes for any invoices that have been issued and then cancelled. With this module, you can issue credit notes by selecting the invoice you want to refund. It only works with issued invoices. No more problems with invoices and journal entries. With this module, you avoid submitting invoices that have been cancelled. You can also issue credit notes in PDF and send them to your clients.
module.author: Línea Gráfica

module.name: groupinc
module.description: This module lets you apply an increment or a discount to product price depending on the customer's group
module.description_full: This module lets you apply an increment or a discount to product price depending on the customer's group.
module.additional_description: Apply different price to the product depending on the group that customer belongs to You can apply a increment/discount to: Wholesale price Pre-tax retail price Retail price with tax Apply a markup to your products
module.author: Community

module.name: ec_seo404
module.displayName: SEO - disabled and deleted 301 redirect Products
module.description: End with 404 pages and referencing loss for disabled or deleted product
module.description_full: End with 404 pages and referencing loss for disabled or deleted product. You will be able to choose for each case a 301 (Ideal for SEO)
module.additional_description: Whenever a product is disabled or deleted, you will be able to assign a 301 redirect. No need to turn your catalog to find out which product is not active or has been removed, you can see them with the module and react accordingly. Not overload your HTACCESS file and therefore no notion necessary to make it work ! The SEO which existed to this product will be redirected in confidence to a similar product, category page, etc. ... And not lose all the SEO that page had. With a color scheme, get in a glance the status of your references: - Green => Redirection possible for disabled or deleted products, but the redirection is not active. - Orange => Redirection possible for disabled or deleted products, but the redirection is not active and no link is specified for the redirection. - Red => Redirection enabled, but no link! So page 404 as usual!
module.author: Ether Création

module.name: lgcookieslaw
module.displayName: EU Cookie Law (Notification Banner + Cookie Blocker)
module.description: THE ONLY MODULE THAT FULLY COMPLIES WITH THE EU COOKIE LAW. Display a customized warning banner and disable cookies when users enter your website until you obtain their consent
module.description_full: THE ONLY MODULE THAT FULLY COMPLIES WITH THE EU COOKIE LAW. Display a customized warning banner and disable cookies when users enter your website until you obtain their consent.
module.additional_description: Our module fully complies with the European Cookie Law. Complete compliance with the law Besides displaying a warning banner, our module is the only one that allows you to block the cookies when users enter your store. As established by the law, you "shall ensure that the storing of information, or the gaining of access to information already stored, in the terminal equipment of a subscriber or user is only allowed on condition that the subscriber or user concerned has given his or her consent, having been provided with clear and comprehensive information." Please note that all the other cookie modules sold on Addons only allows you to display a warning banner regardless of the user consent. Cookies are installed on the users' computer without obtaining their consent and regardless of their will. Main features of the modules Display a warning banner on every page to inform users about the use of cookies and ask for their consent Disable a list of modules when users enter the website because warning users about cookies is useless and illegal if you have already installed cookies on their computer. Enable these cookies after having obtained their consent or maintain them disabled if they refuse. Fully customize the warning banner (colour, text, link, font, position, multilingual mode, transparency...) Getting the user consent   The module includes 3 different ways to ask user consent, you can choose between: Acceptance through a button: Users must click on the "I accept" button in the warning banner to give his consent. As soon as users give their consent, the warning banner disappears and all the modules using cookies will get enabled and will work as usual. But if users refuse to give their consent, the disabled modules will remain disabled. Acceptance through the navigation (with banner disappearance): If users continue browsing the website, they will accept the use of cookies. The warning banner is displayed on the first page on which users arrive with a message like « By continuing browsing the website, you accept the use of cookies ». As soon as users decide to go to another page, the banner automatically disappears and the disabled modules will get enabled. Acceptance through the navigation (without banner disappearance) : If users continue browsing the website, they will accept the use of cookies. Works the same as the previous option except the fact that the banner is always displayed and never disappears. The selected cookies will be disabled when users enter the store and will get enabled only when users will decide to go another page. Note: the consent remains valid during the period of time set in the module interface (we recommend you not to go over 13 months) Customizing the banner content and design As recommended by the European authority, the module allows you to customize the warning message inside the banner (to inform users about the cookies users and their purpose) and add a "More information" button into the banner that take users to a CMS page of your store (to explain in details the use of cookies on your store). The module comes with a Wysiwyg editor that allows you to fully customize the content of the banner (font, colour, effects, html code, links...). You can also choose from the configuration page the background colour of the banner, its percentage of opacity (transparency) and its position (top or bottom of the page). Moreover, the module is mutlilingual and automatially detects all the languages of your store, which allows you to set a different warning message per language. Note: the module is designed to not display a warning message when search engines robots cawl you store in order not to affect your SEO. Disabling the modules that use cookies This is the only module that allows you to choose the modules/cookies that you want to disable until users give their consent. This feature is compulsory because it is useless and illegal to inform users if you have already installed cookied on their computer with their consent. "Member States shall ensure that the storing of information, or the gaining of access to information already stored, in the terminal equipment of a subscriber or user is only allowed on condition that the subscriber or user concerned has given his or her consent, having been provided with clear and comprehensive information, in accordance with Directive 95/46/EC” EU Cookie Law To comply with the directive of the EU Cookie Law, we recommend you to disable the tracking (Google Analytics), social sharing (Facebook " Like ", Google " +1 ", etc.) and targeted advertising modules. Please note that all modules that are required for the good running of your PrestaShop store (ex: basket cookie, session cookie...) don't require any consents
module.author: Línea Gráfica

module.name: pushoncart
module.description: Мы приглашаем вас быстро увеличить средне-покупательную способность корзины ваших клиентов, благодаря специальной акции прекрасно адаптированной для покупательной способности ваших клиентов
module.description_full: Мы приглашаем вас быстро увеличить средне-покупательную способность корзины ваших клиентов, благодаря специальной акции прекрасно адаптированной для покупательной способности ваших клиентов.
module.additional_description: свободное повышение средне-покупательной способности корзины ваших клиентов легкое сбывание запасов продуктов по вашему выбору дайте попробовать вашим клиентам те новые продукты, которые они может еще не знают, создавая потребность, и верность покупателя повышение удовлетворенности клиентов через акции приятно адаптированные к их потребностям
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: cartabandonmentpro
module.description: Improve your conversion rate by 15% (and more) with abandoned carts reminder emails!
module.description_full: Improve your conversion rate by 15% (and more) with abandoned carts reminder emails!
module.additional_description: An automatic email is sent to customers each time they add products to their shopping cart but does not purchase. It reminds and encourages them to complete the order. It’s beneficial and easy to use! Automatically send one or more personalized emails to remind your customers about the contents of their cart. This helps turn abandoned carts into sales. Easily create email templates tailored to match your online store’s theme.
module.author: PrestaShop
